long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The AT&T MFA app for Chrome is the companion to the AT&T MFA mobile app for your smart phone. The AT&T MFA app for Chrome is the companion to the AT&T MFA mobile app for your smart phone.

The AT&T MFA Chrome extension makes it possible to use your phone as a security key authenticator with the Chrome browser.

AT&T MFA makes authentication easy and secure:
- No more passwords or 6-digit codes
- Push to login
- Immune to phishing

AT&T MFA utilizes the standardized FIDO Universal 2nd Factor (U2F) and WebAuthn (FIDO2) protocol to provide secure, un-phishable authentication on the web, now in the convenient form factor that is your phone.

Get started in 3 steps:
1. Download the AT&T MFA authenticator app for your smart phone
2. Enable the AT&T MFA Chrome browser extension
3. Scan the QR code using the AT&T MFA app on your phone

==Zero Trust==
AT&T MFA is built on top of an end-to-end verified and encrypted architecture. This means zero trust. We never get access to any of your keys or login information. The keys only live in the app on your phone.

Learn more here: https://akamai.com/mfa
